attributes.additional_details: We all hate our taxes, all our taxes get taken away to buy things for our country, you may not realise but about 46 percent of what we earn a year gets taken away by our taxes, we would all be much wealthier and not so worried about money problems if our taxes went down. Obviously you have to think of the consiquenses, like our country having to get in debt with other countries and  us not being able to ship things in from other countries, but I think that our taxes should only take away 30 percent of our yearly salary.
